publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3713# Shona Robison: Records of Property Ownership—That the Parliament notes that many communal properties in the ownership of private landlords receive no maintenance and little repair; recognises that these properties blight surrounding areas; acknowledges the good work of local councils in trying to enforce repair works, and believes that the Scottish Executive should assist local councils in this work by making records of property ownership readily available to them.
S1M-3713# Records of Property Ownership (lodged on 16 December 2002) Michael Matheson*, Alex Neil*

S1M-3713# Shona Robison: Records of Property Ownership—That the Parliament notes that many communal properties in the ownership of private landlords receive no maintenance and little repair; recognises that these properties blight surrounding areas; acknowledges the good work of local councils in trying to enforce repair works, and believes that the Scottish Executive should assist local councils in this work by making records of property ownership readily available to them.Supported by: Michael Matheson, Alex Neil
S1M-3713# Records of Property Ownership (lodged on 16 December 2002) Brian Adam*
S1M-3713# Records of Property Ownership (lodged on 16 December 2002) Christine Grahame*
S1M-3713# Records of Property Ownership (lodged on 16 December 2002) Robin Harper*R
S1M-3713# Records of Property Ownership (lodged on 16 December 2002) Linda Fabiani*, Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-3713# Records of Property Ownership (lodged on 16 December 2002) Ms Sandra White*
S1M-3713# Records of Property Ownership (lodged on 16 December 2002) Mr Kenneth Gibson*

S1M-3713# Shona Robison: Records of Property Ownership—That the Parliament notes that many communal properties in the ownership of private landlords receive no maintenance and little repair; recognises that these properties blight surrounding areas; acknowledges the good work of local councils in trying to enforce repair works, and believes that the Scottish Executive should assist local councils in this work by making records of property ownership readily available to them. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Alex Neil, Brian Adam, Christine Grahame, Robin Harper R, Linda Fabiani, Mr Gil Paterson, Ms Sandra White, Mr Kenneth Gibson
